parameter.value: Ahoy there, |PLAYERNAME|! Welcome to Thunder Cove.
I'm in charge of the muscle around here. I've got my hands full dealing with the rogues on Clandestia.
Thunder cove was settled by adventours seafarers, but not long after the town was established we split into two factions.
Clandestia is the smaller island to the west there the rebels have their hideout.
